scenario_text.value:
Huh? Is that Haru? What’s he doing walking
around all by himself?

(How does he feel about things? Wait, I can’t
ask him. He doesn’t have a partner, huh?)
(Oh, crap, he took off. Where’s he going?)

(Hmm? Is that the Professor? Why’s he trying
to be all sneaky?)

(Wait, is he following Haru? Why would he
ever do something like that?)

Takuma, I found Falcomon! He’s in those
apartments over there!

Great, nice work, Agumon! You’re always so
helpful! Now let’s go find him!
Aww, thanks, Takuma! Falcomon’s this way!

(Huh? The Professor’s gone. I’m curious about
what’s going on, but Falcomon comes first.)
